modules.midiData

Class MidiParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • modules.midiData.MidiParser

  • public abstract class MidiParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper class for parsing midi files

    Public methods are thread-safe

    Author:
    Nelphindal

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  MidiParser.DecodingException
      Exception indicating that an error occurred while decoding previously parsed midi-events
      protected class  MidiParser.ParsingException
      Exception indicating that an error occured while parsing selected file and generating the midi-events

        Creates a new Parser using giving implementation.

        Returns:
        the selected parser

      • getDuration

        public final double getDuration()
        Returns:
        the duration of entire song in seconds

      • getMidi

        public final java.lang.String getMidi()
        Returns:
        the currently used midi-file

      • instruments

        public final java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,MidiInstrument> instruments()
        Parses the selected midi file and returns the instruments.

        This method is thread-safe

        Returns:
        a map with parsed instruments

      • midi2abc

        public final void midi2abc(Path wd)
        Creates the files remap.exe of BruTE is expecting. These are the midigram and the mftext from the midi with the like the midi2abc tool does.
        Parameters:
        wd - working directory for BruTE

      • parse

        public final MidiMap parse()
        Parses the selected midi file.

        This method is thread-safe

        Returns:
        a map of all midi events

      • setMidi

        public final boolean setMidi(Path midi)
        Sets given midi to be parsed
        Parameters:
        midi -
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise

      • titles

        public final java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> titles()
        Parses the selected midi file and returns the titles.

        This method is thread-safe

        Returns:
        a map with parsed titles

      • tracks

        public final java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> tracks()
        Returns:
        a set of all indices of last parsed midi.

      • createEvent

        protected final MidiEvent createEvent(byte[] message,
                    int delta)
                               throws MidiParser.ParsingException
        Creates a new midi event described by given bytes and delta ticks. Header chunks are not allowed (starting with MT).
        Parameters:
        message - bytes to parse
        delta - a time offset to prior event in milliseconds
        Returns:
        the parsed event
        Throws:
        MidiParser.ParsingException

      • createMidiMap

        protected abstract void createMidiMap()
                               throws MidiParser.ParsingException,
                                      java.io.IOException
        Reads the given midi-file
        Throws:
        MidiParser.ParsingException - if any errors occur while parsing
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O-Error occurs

      • decodeMidiMap

        protected abstract void decodeMidiMap()
                               throws MidiParser.DecodingException
        Decodes the previously read midi-map
        Throws:
        MidiParser.DecodingException

      • parse

        protected final MidiEvent parse(InputStream in)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                MidiParser.ParsingException
        Parses a single midi event reading from given InputStream.
        Parameters:
        in - InputStream to read from
        Returns:
        next midi event
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O-Error occurs.
        MidiParser.ParsingException - if the midi file breaks the grammar of midi-files

      • prepareMidi

        protected abstract void prepareMidi(Path midi)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Requests to delete and clear all cached data to prepare next parsing routine
        Parameters:
        midi -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
